loginDescription: Injiza amakuru yawe kugira ngo ubashe kugera ku rubuga rw'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
homePagePurpose: Gucunga neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, gutanga raporo, no koroshya imiyoborere y'ishuri.
homePageFeature1Desc: Imbonerahamwe zihariye ku Bayobozi, Abarimu, n'Abanyamabanga.
homePageFeature2Desc: Kwinjiza amanota mu buryo bworoshye, kubara mu buryo bwikora, n'indangamanota zisobanutse.
homePageFeature3Desc: Gutanga raporo z'imitsindire ku munyeshuri, ku ishuri, no ku isomo.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda rwo kureberaho porogaramu.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho iby'ingenzi bikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kugenagutinda cyangwa gutsindwa mu manota na raporo.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha ry'imeyili ku byabaye muri sisitemu riteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza kandi ntiriraboneka ubu.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibya ziada nk'iyoherezwa rya raporo muri PDF/Excel, igenamiterere ryimbitse rya raporo, n'uburyo bw'itumanaho (nk'imenyesha rya SMS/imeyili) biteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza cya Report-Manager Lite. Uburyo bwo "Kohereza muri CSV" buhari butanga gusa uburyo bw'ibanze bwo gukuramo amakuru.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
